targets.query: SELECT 256000 - mean("value") FROM "mem.active.kilobytes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*8 FROM "speedtest.download" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")*8 FROM "speedtest.upload" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
